features: Antiseptic Towelettes: Benzalkonium chloride towelettes help prevent minor cuts, nicks, and scrapes from becoming infected
Broad-Range BZK Antiseptic Towelettes: Use these small alcohol wipes to treat wounds, minor cuts, and scrapes
Shelf-Stable First Aid Alcohol Wipes: These individually packaged sanitizing alcohol wipes boast an exceptional shelf life and are unlikely to dry out in adverse storage conditions

Personal and Professional First Aid Solutions: First Aid Only offers a full line of first aid kits, cabinets, and stations, Emergency Response Care, individual first aid products, Spill Clean Up kits, CPR care and more
body.description: Pac-Kit alcohol wipes pack contains 10 benzalkonium chloride antiseptic towelettes designed to help prevent infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and abrasions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: First Aid Refills Keeping your first aid kit or cabinet fully stocked is very important. First Aid Only offers a full selection of refill items to meet all your first aid needs. The individual boxes are perfectly sized for any application and can be used in both a first aid kit or as a stand-alone refill.

About Unitized Refill Boxes Feature 1: ANSI Color Guide Packaging Consistent color-coded packaging matches ANSI recommendations for easy identification when the user needs to find a first aid supply to treat an injury or know what to reorder for their kit. Feature 2: Organization Each unitized box is shrink-wrapped to keep product contained during shipping. Feature 3: Simplification Unit boxes simplify finding what you need in an emergency, as well as when you need to restock. Feature 4: Flexibility Missing a refill box in your First Aid Kit or Cabinet? The First Aid Only unitized refill boxes come in a variety of sizes to help you select the refill you need when replenishing your cabinet. The interchangeable refill boxes allow you to customize your kit or cabinet to meet the needs for a wide range of industries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handwipe size 4.5" x 7.75"
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for... something to sanitize my hands before I applied a band aid. Very wet, strong material, and large enough to feel like I really had something to "wash" my hands with. Benzalkonium Chloride 0.133%; Sodium bicarbonate; Water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact box of BZK wipes. Made in the USA.
reviews.reviewText: This pack of BZK antiseptic wipes comes exactly as pictured; in a compact box, sealed in plastic. The top of the box is labeled nicely, so you can easily locate it in a kit. The back of the box, as well as the back of the individual wipes, include the drug information. They're made in the USA and include the company information, which is located in CT.These are great for refilling your first aid kit or for throwing in your pack for a hike. Highly recommended.I'm including pictures of the actual product to show the labeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small box of ten wipes expires in two years
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to add to my first aid kit in early January 2016, and the expiration date is January 2018. That's long enough to suit me!As advertised, each packet one wipe with .13% Benzalkonium Chloride.Edited to add: I have used these a few times now, and I am as pleased with the quality as with any other brand I've used. This was a good buy for me, and I will purchase them again when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars As advertised and sealed up right.
reviews.reviewText: I've been purchasing medical products on here for my family First Aid Kits, and have noticed a wide disparity between really good, reliable products and those products that seem to carry comments from people upset that the product they received was not the image depicted or was (in the realm of medical products like bandages) made in a particular country or arrived less-than-sterile.So, in that spirit I'm offering my observation on these. The product was exactly as depicted in the picture, and arrived sealed in plastic (like as in a package of chewing gum, with cellophane and a red rip line around it). That right away was a big plus for me. Country of origin is not indicated on the external packaging (I haven't cracked it open yet) but the enclosing box contains drug facts on the back--it has to as the wipes are medicated. But that also indicated to me that this was something specifically intended for sale here in the U.S. and therefore reliably meeting U.S. safety requirements. So four stars and job well done.UPDATE: I've opened the package (to assign to different kits) and the individually wrapped towelettes are made in the U.S.A.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised. The package contains 10 Benzalkonium Chloride ...
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as advertised. The package contains 10 Benzalkonium Chloride Antiseptic Towelettes. I am in the process of building my own first aid kit and was looking for antiseptics for use in burns. The advantage of this item is that it does not burn or sting with application, especially important in treating burn injuries. This will go into my first aid kit and I will purchase again as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great refill product
reviews.reviewText: I hate buying a completely new first aid kit just to replace the small individually packaged items. This refill allows me to maintain the multiple first aid kits I have around the house and for camping/backpacking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nurse mom says, “Must have for first aid kit!”
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for first aid kit. My daughter cut her foot on barnacles and I was so happy I had these on hand until we could get her to the hospital that was an hour away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars As dry as a desert
reviews.reviewText: Arrived in a seal wrapped box but towelettes were all dry. Expiration date on them wasn't so great either. Rubbish.
